nmrglue.proc_lp¶

Linear Prediction (LP) functions for extrapolating and modeling NMR signals

This module is imported as nmrglue.proc_lp and can be called as such.

High-Level Functions¶

lp
lp_svd
lp_qr
lp_cho
lp_tls
lp2d
cadzow
lp_model

These functions are called by high-level function are and most uses will not use them in common processing scripts.

Low-Level Functions¶

lp_1d
extrapolate_2d
make_lp2d_Dd
cadzow_single
root2damp
root2freq
cof2amp
cof2phase
make_D
make_d
make_Dd
make_mirror
find_lpc
find_lpc_svd
pinv_diagsvd
find_lpc_qr
find_lpc_cholesky
find_lpc_tls
find_lpc_fb
find_lpc_bf
find_lproots_hsvd
find_roots
find_coeff
reverse_filter
fix_roots
extrapolate
